'''Notes'''
Nice small, long battery life netbook. Although Ubuntu reports that additional wifi drives are available, it worked for me out of the box. The only thing that didn't work with my ubuntu 10.10 and kernel  2.6.38-10-generic was brightness adjustment. It is especially problem when running on battery and display is dim. There is a bug raised <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/udev/+bug/574250|bug 574250]]</nowiki> and also solution.
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:voria/ppa
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
sudo apt-get install samsung-tools samsung-backlight
sudo reboot
